phrases: The large viruses have increased 100,000 times.
I want to go to the beach!!
I do not want to do homework...
I do not want any extra Summer courses
The world is fascinated in this taste
Limited distribution in anticipation for KOOGY's collaboration.
I worked up my courage and tried turning around.
By coincidence, Azuki turned around at the same time.
A tenth of a second felt like ten seconds.
Then I turned back and hurried onwards.
But I turned back again for two or three seconds.
In the distance, Azuki was looking back too.
It was like Azuki and I were on the same wavelength.
Azuki probably turned around ten times, two of them just happened to meet with you.
That must be an awesome feeling.
It is not something that I can understand.
Are you making fun of me?
The first time I saw Azuki was in my sixth year of elementary school.
You and I went to Ake elementary and she went to Akeni elementary.
It was at a swimming contest between our schools.
While she was on the other side of the pool, supporting, we watched each other the whole time.
At that time, neither of us felt embarrassed.
Also, at the middle school entrance ceremony,
At that time, we were pretty close to each other so both of us turned away quickly.
You were conscious of each other since elementary school?
But it is really only looking back now that I realize it.
Well, okay, but no matter how much your wavelengths match,
if you do not exchange email addresses, you cannot have a conversation with her.
It will be fine as long as I get her email by graduation.
Here, I wrote five pages so far.
It is because I was writing while you were reminiscing.
TL note: Futatsu no Chikyuu = The Two Earths
The Earth we live on is nothing but a clone of the real Earth,
and we humans are nothing but clones of the humans on the real Earth.
Yes, we were made by the real humans as materials for experiments.
By being in the same environment, we are left independent and observed by our copies
in order to create a better world.
So, for the real Earth, researching us has brought an end to war and global warming.
I knew it, it sucks, right?
I knew a name was too high a hurdle to try to overcome so quickly.
I did not know how to divide the panels and stuff, and the pictures...
Did you rip this story off from somewhere?
I did not, but forgive me if it has something in common with something else...
Anyone could come up with something like this.
This is not something anyone could come up with!
Actually, I am really getting drawn in by this setup.
But after that part, all I had was the people from the real Earth fighting with these humans.
I am attracted by it because I can picture that happening.
It could be an all out battle, could not it?!
Or do you have anything more interesting than this in mind?
Well, I had an idea for a sports story.
TL note: Gurasan Pitcher = Sunglasses Pitcher
An elementary schooler with a strong fast ball is trying to make it to the pros,
but he gets hit right in the forehead by a shot hit towards the pitcher, and is blinded.
Ten years later, suddenly a pitcher wearing sunglasses appears on a pro mound.
With 180 km/h throws at every angle; high, low, inside, and outside,
Having never given up on his dream of going pro,
there is a story of the secret special training he did for ten years with his dad.
The fact that he cannot see gets out, and while he is in a dispute with the baseball association,
he battles with rivals trying to hit his throws.
I knew you had talent, Shuujin!
Normally nobody could come up with that much of a story on that premise!
You really think I have talent?!
Yes, usually it would sound stu
Honestly, I have been trying desperately to come up with stories day after day.
Even I thought I might have been over confident...
But now that you have recognized me, I have really got confidence.
I will do my best, too.
I will draw artwork that can compliment your story.
So which story should we go with?
I have got a feeling Gurasan is not suited to being a series.
Is there an ideal amount of pages it should be?
I heard the Rookie Award has set 31 to 45 pages.
Well, do not worry about the page count for now, just draw a whole lot.
I already had the beginning in my head.
Well, even if it is done at a fast pace, it does not matter if it is not interesting.
I do not want to go.
Ah, she is coming over here.
Ignoring people when they call you...
Takagi, I have got something to talk to you about.
Miho said, Why does Takagi-kun know about my dreams for the future?
You told him, did not you?
Then she got angry at me!
It does not really matter, does it?
I just checked with her to see if it was true.
I told you Miho's shy and that you should not tell anyone!
I know, I will not tell anyone else.
How about you ask her how she is going to be a seiyuu if she is that shy?
Like hell I could say that.
Anyway, I will not spread it around anymore so relax.
So, did you get rejected by Miho?
You have got to be kidding.
You said you talked with Miho, right?
I am saying I just asked her to see if it was true.
Azuki likes someone else anyway, right?
I do not know, but third year middle school girls usually have someone they like, right?
But Miho never said anything about that, so...
Hey, wait a second, why were you probing me about Miho anyway?
I wanted to talk to you, Miyoshi.
Ah, now you have done it.
If you say you were joking, she will either cry or get pissed.
You know her, she is been in nationals for karate or aikido or something.
Also, she likes you in the first place, does not she?
I mean, she told you her best friend's secrets.
It seems she likes you, does not it?
Then, she said, Let me think about it.
There is no way she would say that if she did not like you.
But I cannot let it go on like this!
She is not bad, that Miyoshi.
She is Azuki's best friend, so she must be a good person.
What do you think of him, Takagi?
Well, he is good at studying and exercise, and he is tall.
I am not good enough for him.
I am sure Takagi-kun thinks so too.
But Takagi can definitely get Iwase to go out with him.
It is even a rumor in our class.
I do not think Iwase-san is someone easy for boys to approach.
Who is the person you like, Miho?
I thought you would say that.
Come on, hurry up and tell me.
You are kind of stuck up, just like Iwase.
I have never seen you talking with a boy.
That is stuck up, is not it?
I am just embarrassed around boys so I cannot talk to them.
I really like boys, even more than you, Kaya.
Maybe it is because I do not have any brothers,
and go bright red from just trying to talk to them, so I cannot.
It is really funny when you start talking like a teacher, Miho.
But when you do, you are always serious so I know you are not lying.
When you give Takagi-kun your reply, do it alone, okay?
I hate being around for those sorts of things.
Maybe we are on the same wavelength.
No matter how many times I write it, I do not like it.
And it will be summer vacation soon.
Do not push yourself too hard.
I am still not at the level where I can do a manuscript.
Worst case scenario, you can write the second half while I am drawing the first half.
The test had the same pattern of questions you said it would have.
I know your dad said it was okay,
but to stay stuffed in a workplace all vacation long...
As your mother I need to put my foot down.
Please try to come home once in a while.
It is fine with me, but did not your parents make a big fuss about it?
They were pretty cool with it.
He used to work hard and drink those, did not he?
Since we are going to be working hard too.
You sure are trying to follow his footsteps.
Then let me revise my statement.
Let us finish the manuscript before the end of summer vacation!
My name is becoming a manga!
I am fixing the panel division and composition.
Heh, even this looks like it would make an amazing manga if it were inked.
It is still a long way off from completion.
Next I have got the under-sketch to do.
I will not be doing the inking any time soon.
It is not at that stage yet.
I am trying to improve my level right up until I do the inking.
Saikou, even though you say manga does not have a limit,
are not your standards a little too high?
From my perspective, this is plenty.
No, I am still not there at all.
Okay, do it the way you want to.
And I will keep doing the name until it is something I approve of.
Yeah, I will not interfere with your name, and you will not interfere with my drawings.
As if I could get to sleep that fast.
I have been thinking too much, so it is actually making it hard to sleep.
I am going to read some more manga.
Are there any manga you have been into recently?
Hm, it is got to be Dragon Ball.
That is your favorite manga, is not it?
It is kind of unshakable, and it is kind of my starting point.
Ah, did you ever make-believe Dragon Ball when you were a kid?
Shuujin, your sion timing was late, was not it?
My sion was perfect, your sion was too fast.
No, you need to say sion with more of a SION!
or it is not a real sion!
Are you saying my jan was not the real thing?
Oh, Saikou, you are awake too?
I am going to try inking.
There is only a month left of summer vacation.
I am still not fully satisfied with my pen handling,
but as I expected, I must get started.
I am not saying you should rush the name though.
You stick to doing it until you are satisfied with it.
All right, I have finished up to the middle.
Good job, take a little break.
Aw, now I have done it!
I wonder if I can fix this with white-out?
Want To go outside for a bit?
The top hit on the charts this week,
though it was only released in July, has already achieved one million in sales.
I thought I was going to die.
Hey, this song sure is good, huh?
That song from his new album.
I want to go to his summer tour.
Yeah, you have got to enjoy your summer vacation!
Come on, let us go back and work.
It is about time for me to get some sleep.
He is already done all this.
I am going to the convenience store.
If we need to buy anything, I will go.
From this point on, I will not be touching the manuscript, so I will go.
By the way, maybe Azuki will come if we call her.
I am kidding, I am kidding.
I just thought it would get you energized.
I know Azuki's not that kind of girl.
Excuse me, I am trying to take this book.
You sure took a while, were there no convenience stores open nearby?
This is from the same place as usual.
Ah, you bought a Jack for me.
It is not just the drawings, the story's interesting too.
If we are losing... it is with the pictures!
I do not want to lose.
But even the story was good.
There is no way in hell I will lose!
Is there anything I can do to help out?
You finished your name alone, Shuujin.
I want to finish my job alone, too.
I did not interfere with your name.
You will not interfere with my artwork.
No, I just thought this way we would both be working on it at the moment it was finished...
Here, attach these to all of the Earth soldier's pants!
Let us keep going nonstop until we are done!
The drawings are good, but I do not about my story.
The story is good, but I do not know about my drawings.
Do not you think this sort of thing is embarrassing?
Okay, let us call right away.
The number is probably stored in the phone's memory.
Do you think if we call this way, they will think it is Kawaguchi Tarou's ghost?
Call on your cell phone if you are that worried.
Just something like I would like to bring in a manuscript.
Hello, this is the editorial department for Shounen Jack.
We are bringing our first manga into Jack's editorial department.
Will the editor we meet be a hit or miss?
Dreams are sweet, reality is bitter!
